column1: Something is wrong. Something wrong is happening around me and all around in Japan. My child was abducted by a governmental agency.
The Child Guidance Center abducted my child and has taken it in custody since February. I just wanted my child to live freely in dignity.
My life
column3: is ending now. No parent right remains to protect my child's dignity. Is it a child abuse to respect its own will?

column1: 育ち盛りの子ども用の『ノビーノ　カルシウム＋ビタミン』というサプリメント、子供の成長に必要なカルシウムやマグネシウム、そして、各種ビタミン類などの栄養成分がたっぷり入っていて、とても良い感じでした。ヨーグルト風味で美味しいく食べられるところもとても良いです。
